name: Olaf Saves Christmas
description:
This game was made for the Game Jam "JameGam" 2021. 

All images, coding and music was made by me, during the last 3 days :D

Story:

Olaf, the cute little snowman, found Santas hat which he tries to return, because Santa can't navigate without him and needs him to detect where he has to deliver his presents.

If he don't get him back, Christmas is ruined !!!

Controls: 

 "A" and "D" to move, "W" to jump and "Space" to shoot.

Let's go, catch Santa !!!
